Description: Sliver of strap handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine orange-pink. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 101a 38, 110 8 or 206 29 Name Boethos. Probably from same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, CEALEX CRI01061.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0508)
